newsitem.title: ESTONIA: Estonia market at record on Hansapank trade.
newsitem.headline: Estonia market at record on Hansapank trade.

text.p: Trade in leading bank Hansapank pushed volumes on the Estonian stock market up to a record level 28 million kroons on Friday, dealers said.
Hansapank showed turnover of 26 million kroons as a block of 100,000 shares passed through the market at 104.40 kroons. It closed at 104.50 kroons versus 103.80 kroons.
The Tallinn stock exchange index closed 0.74 percent higher at 104.55 and volume on the over-the-counter free market was 10 million kroons.
Apart from Hansapank, Savings Bank was in focus as it ended 2.15 kroons higher at 39.80 on 1.8 million kroons volume.
The activity came as the company continues with its subscriptions for an issue of 3.2 million new shares.
Drug maker Tallinn Pharmaceutical was the most active on the free market, turning over 2.3 million kroons and ending unchanged at 53 kroons.
